backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with membership types and access control, providing queries and updates for caller profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to relevant frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend components, pages, hooks, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling routing, providers, and rendering pages inside AppShell.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart items, totals, and operations like add, remove, and clear.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for Product and CartItem used in cart functionality.
frontend/src/cart/useCart.ts: Hook exposing the cart context and enforcing provider usage.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper with header, logo, auth button, and bottom navigation including cart badge.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Sign-in/out button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new users for a display name and creating an initial profile.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Guard component showing a sign-in prompt when user authentication is missing.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines a static list of product objects with IDs, descriptions, pricing, and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication and state, including login and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks to fetch and update user profiles and membership types via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for styling, including light and dark mode settings.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Exports a helper to format numbers as USD currency strings.
frontend/src/lib/membershipPlanUrls.ts: Maps membership types to external subscription URLs and provides a lookup function.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart page, listing items, totals, and actions to remove items.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero content, feature sections, an about section, and footer.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPlansPage.t: Static membership plans page displaying three tiers with features, pricing, and subscribe links.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipsPage.tsx: Interactive membership plan selector integrating authentication, backend updates, and external payment URLs.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Gourmet products catalog showing product details and allowing users to add items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page displaying account info, membership status, and prompting profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Terms and conditions page presenting scrollable legal text and membership rules.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors via CSS variables, extended fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing the LE GOURMAND mobile app scope, architectural notes, existing features, and issues, including expansion to products and cart with Firebase auth.
